tool.name: Process reference
tool.description: Process file of reference to use in miRDeep2
tool.help:
**What it does** Prepare reference file FASTA used in the next module miRDeep2.
**Input** A file format FASTA which is the reference genome of specie studied, and a word of three letters to indicate specie studied.
**Output** A file FASTA containing genome of specie studied without spaces.
